summary:
Star Trek is a popular American sci-fi franchise created by Gene Roddenberry in the 1960s. It started as a TV show about the crew of a spaceship, the USS Enterprise, exploring the universe. The show became a huge hit and led to many spin-offs, including movies, books, and video games.

The franchise has a big fan base, known as "Trekkies." It's famous for its diverse characters and has influenced many other TV shows and movies. Star Trek also stands out for its messages about equality and civil rights.
title: Star Trek
